ComicInfo.Title: The Bird in the Cage
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man opens his eyes to find himself in a secluded hotel room, covered in blood. He can't remember where he is or how he got there, and soon finds himself in police custody. Before he can make sense of things, he is met by a lawyer from Poseidon Logistics, who makes him an offer he can't refuse. Meanwhile, the Butcher inches closer to his target, one takedown at a time... The bloody hunt for justice continues in the second chapter of the thrilling series by Selçuk Ören.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-28 21:27:52. [CVDB898187]
